title: Traveling Sports Teams Score Big At Courtyard Boston Woburn/Burlington
text:
Courtyard Boston Woburn/ Burlington
Hotel in Woburn offers discounted room rates, complimentary bus parking and 5,000 Marriott Rewards points when 10 or more rooms are booked by March 31, 2016
WOBURN, Mass. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Fall is upon us, and so are a multitude of sports. Traveling teams attending an upcoming tournament in the Boston area can come out ahead when they book a stay at Courtyard Boston Woburn/Burlington .
Knowing that taking teams on the road involves much more than just the game itself, one of the premier hotels in Woburn, MA is giving players and their fans plenty to cheer about. When groups book a block of 10 or more rooms, they'll receive discounted rates, complimentary bus parking and 5,000 bonus Marriott Rewards points.
When it comes to convenience, players staying at Courtyard are in for a win with a convenient commute to:
Woburn Racket Club: 1.6 miles Burlington Swim & Tennis Club: 3.6 miles Burbank Ice Arena: 5.3 miles Aleppo Shriners Auditorium: 6.2 miles Cousens Gym Complex – Tufts University : 8.7 miles The Edge Sports Center: 10.4 miles Boston College Alumni Stadium: 17.9 miles Cawley Memorial Stadium, Lowell High School : 18.4 miles Agganis Arena – Boston University : 18.6 miles After an exciting day, teams can head back to the Woburn hotel and celebrate their win at The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect. Serving up mouthwatering meals including juicy burgers, fresh salads and tasty wings, The Bistro has something to satisfy every craving. For a private dinner or team breakfast, Courtyard also features a meeting room that can accommodate up to 30 guests and offers refreshing event menus.
Athletes looking to stay on their game even off the field or court can enjoy a brisk workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center, featuring a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment with personal TV screens.
Modernly appointed guest rooms give group travelers all the space they need to spread out and wind down. Travelers can choose between two double beds or a king bed and pull-out sofa. When it's time to get relaxed, players can kick back and enjoy a show on a flat-panel TV, or stay connected with friends and family using complimentary Wi-Fi right in the room. Large bathrooms, mini refrigerators, coffee makers and luxurious bedding are among the many thoughtful amenities travelers will enjoy.
About the Courtyard Boston Woburn/ Burlington
Courtyard Boston Woburn/ Burlington at 240 Mishawum Road in Woburn, MA is near Burlington Mall and within 15 miles of Faneuil Hall, Fenway Park and Logan International Airport (BOS). The hotel features 3 floors with 118 rooms, 2 suites, 2 meeting rooms with 766 square feet of total event space, a fitness room, outdoor pool and The Bistro. For information, visit www.CourtyardWoburnSports.com or call 1-781-932-3200.
